parking.info: Free parking available in adjacent lots. Carpooling encouraged as spaces may be limited on race day.
alternativeOptions: Street parking available on surrounding blocks (check signage)
Paid parking garage 2 blocks north on Main Street
Park & Ride shuttle service from Metro Transit (details TBD)

transit.metro: Green Line to TBD Station, 3-block walk to venue
transit.bike: Bike racks available at venue. Nice Ride stations nearby.

accessibility.facilities: Accessible restrooms, wheelchair accessible starting area
accessibility.accommodations: Contact us for specific accessibility needs
accessibility.serviceAnimals: Service animals welcome. Please notify us in advance.

directions.fromNorth: Take I-35W South to Exit 19, follow signs to venue
directions.fromSouth: Take I-35W North to Exit 19, follow signs to venue
directions.fromEast: Take I-94 West to I-35W North, Exit 19
directions.fromWest: Take I-394 East to I-35W South, Exit 19
